text: St Leonard's church, Blakemere Blakemere is a parish in Herefordshire, England. It is 11 miles west of Hereford, on the road to Hay-on-Wye. ==External links== ==Distinguish from== * Blakemere visitors' centre near Sandiway in Cheshire * Wyeside information page Category:Villages in Herefordshire
title: Blakemere
